ya3.2.2:537.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhittha dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.2:538.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya3.2.2:539.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya3.2.2:539.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ na nirujjhittha.
ya3.2.2:539.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhittha. (Rūpāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
ya3.2.2:540.1_0: Yassa yattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.2:541.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhittha,
ya3.2.2:541.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.2:541.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca na nirujjhittha dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.2:542.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya3.2.2:543.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya3.2.2:543.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhittha.
ya3.2.2:543.1_2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati manāyatanañca na nirujjhittha.
